unnormalised: Arre yaar, Adv. Sharma is saying that Sec. 138 of the Negotiable Instruments Act is a pain for small businesses, especially with all these cheque bounce cases! Maybe they should just use UPI for everything now, right?
normalised: Arre yaar, Advocate Sharma is saying that Section one thirty eight of the Negotiable Instruments Act is a pain for small businesses, especially with all these cheque bounce cases! Maybe they should just use U-P-I for everything now, right?
